description: This file serves as the entry point for the production build in a Vite-powered Qwik application, specifically for the 'npm run preview' environment. It imports necessary modules such as QwikCity middleware, a server-side plan, and the rendering function, then creates and exports a QwikCity adapter.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Factory function that creates a QwikCity application adapter with specified options including render and plan functions.
